title: Refreshing an Ignition Table
excerpt: How to refresh a table's data property in Ignition Vision Scripting.
content:
In Ignition Vision, you can refresh a table's data property like this:

```python
# This example could go in actionPerformed or a button's script.
table = event.source.parent.getComponent("Table")
system.db.refresh(table, "data")
```
